books.title: Allan Quatermain
books.author: H. Rider Haggard
books.summary: Adventurer Allan Quatermain sets out on a mission to Africa to locate a mysterious tribe of white-skinned people.

books.title: The Black Arrow
books.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
books.summary: During the War of the Roses, a young knight must rescue his lady and find out who killed his father.

books.title: The Autobiography of an Idea
books.author: Louis H. Sullivan
books.summary: Famed architect Louis H. Sullivan recounts his life and career.

books.title: Queen Victoria
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: A sardonic and generally unflattering biography of Victoria Alexandrina, Queen of England.

books.title: Ozma of Oz
books.author: L. Frank Baum
books.summary: A girl gets whisked away to a fairy land and helps restore the proper rulers to the throne.

books.title: Uneasy Money
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: When Lord Dawlish unexpectedly comes into an inheritance, he travels from London to New York to try to give it away.

books.title: The Winter’s Tale
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A king’s unfounded jealousy destroys his family and kingdom.

books.title: Lilith
books.author: George MacDonald
books.summary: After inheriting his ancestral home, a young man discovers another world inside his library and embarks on an allegorical journey.

books.title: The Mystery of Orcival
books.author: Émile Gaboriau
books.summary: A countess is murdered and suspects are quickly detained, but Lecoq is not satisfied and looks in a different direction to solve the case.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Henry Kuttner
books.summary: A collection of short fiction by Henry Kuttner, ordered by date of original publication.

books.title: Recollections of Full Years
books.author: Helen Herron Taft
books.summary: Helen Herron Taft, wife of William Howard Taft, the twenty-seventh President of the United States, recalls her life married to one of America’s most influential political figures.

books.title: The Secret of Chimneys
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.summary: A murder at a country house embroils its weekend guests in an international regicide, while a famous jewel thief may be lurking among them.

books.title: Democracy and Social Ethics
books.author: Jane Addams
books.summary: Jane Addams argues that addressing social issues like poverty and inequality requires shifting from individual morality to a collective understanding of social responsibility.

books.title: Tusculan Disputations
books.author: Cicero
books.summary: Cicero gives practical guidance for living wisely and well by adopting a Stoic outlook and concentrating on the virtues.

books.title: The Columbiad
books.author: Joel Barlow
books.summary: Columbus is shown a history of the western hemisphere since his discoveries.

books.title: The Works of Max Beerbohm
books.author: Max Beerbohm
books.summary: A collection of satirical essays ridiculing pretentiousness through imitation.

books.title: The Stainless Steel Rat
books.author: Harry Harrison
books.summary: An intergalactic thief tries life on the side of the law.

books.title: Jeeves Stories
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A collection of short stories featuring Jeeves and Wooster and the upperclass English life of the early 1900s.

books.title: Religion and the Rise of Capitalism
books.author: R. H. Tawney
books.summary: A tracing of the development of religious thought from the Middle Ages to the dawn of the Industrial Revolution.

books.title: Roughing It
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: Mark Twain’s semiautobiographical account of his travel across the United States.
